channel.title: Always crash after airstrike
channel.description: Did a f6 quicksave after killing that big robot due by calling in the airstrike. Then it crashes and always crashes if I load that quicksave (about 2 or 3 seconds after loading) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_19T13_48_7C0.mdmp (92.4 KB)

item.title: Always crash after airstrike
item.dc:creator: noogie
item.description:
Did a f6 quicksave after killing that big robot due by calling in the airstrike. Then it crashes and always crashes if I load that quicksave (about 2 or 3 seconds after loading)
